title: Foundational Competency Development Course for Online Learning Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in using digital devices and experience with online communication
context.additional_context: Emphasizes developing online learning technologies applicable to real-life work contexts for employees

learning_goals: Learners can utilize basic functions of online real-time teaching tools (e.g., Zoom) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can create self-assessment checklists for each of the four core elements: communication, resource utilization, time management, and technical operation.
Learners can use at least three basic English expressions required for searching and utilizing English-based online resources.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
